```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
target <- old_portfolio %>% filter(Age >= 25 & Age < 45)
sample <- old_portfolio %>% filter(X70.5..Ind == 1) %>% sample_frac(0.25)

target <- rbind(target, sample)
nrow(target)
```

Want 1,000 per major region
```{r}
target %>% group_by(Region) %>%
  summarize(count = n())
```
